meanings.definition: Having the most jiggly or wobbly quality.
meanings.sent1: The jelly was the jiggliest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent2: The jiggliest part of the dance was when they did the twist.
meanings.sent3: The jiggliest jelly on the plate made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the jiggliest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The jiggliest balloon at the fair caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: In a jiggly or wobbly manner.
meanings.sent1: She danced jiggliest when the music was upbeat.
meanings.sent2: The jelly wobbled jiggliest on the plate.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail jiggliest when excited.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled jiggliest in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The jello jiggled jiggliest as the kids ran around the table.
